question: List all the unlock conditions for all the features
answer:
### 📋 **CONTEXT** The user is requesting a comprehensive list of all explicit unlock conditions for various features across the game, as detailed in the provided design and product documentation. This involves extracting specific prerequisites related to player progression, lifetime activity, status, or game state that enable access to or surfacing of features. ### 🎯 **DIRECT ANSWER** Here are the unlock conditions for the various features: | Feature Name | Unlock Conditions | | :-------------------------------------------- | :-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | **Bonus Tiles Powerup** (Bot Games) | - Player has completed at least **25 lifetime moves**.
- Surfaced on game starts.
- Only in bot games.
- Only if `w2e` is available. | | **Bonus Tiles Powerup** (Real Player Games) | - No specific unlock condition (available by default once the feature is live for real player games).
- Both player and opponent must be in the experiment variant and on a compatible build. | | **Seasons Event** | - Player completes **FTUE**.
- The event is live. | | **Solo Series** (General Access) | - Player has played **50 lifetime moves** OR
- Player has claimed **Gems** for the first time (whichever is earlier). | | **Word of The Day (WOTD)** | - Player is in **D01+ cohort** (including D01).
(`wotd_unlock` runtime, default `1`). | | **Economy Changes Pop-up** | - Player is an **old player** (new players receive changes directly without the pop-up).
- First time entering the game post-update. | | **Daily Login Rewards (DLR)** | - Based on **existing pop-up unlock conditions** and **existing pop-up priority logic**. | | **RUX (Best Matches & Swap Frenzy)** | - Player is a **L3+ Lapser** (not returned to the game in at least 3 days).
- Player has **completed the FTUE**. | | **Game Modes L2 Screen** (DBH, Solo Series) | - Specific game modes (e.g., DBH, Solo Series) may have their own unlock conditions (e.g., "play x moves to unlock"). | | **Daily Quests** (Home Screen section) | - For new players, unlocked based on `dqud` runtime (default `1` for D1+).
- For older players, unlocked on **first visit to gameboard** with an auto pop-up. | | **Word Saga Event** | - Player has played **50 lifetime moves** OR
- Player has claimed **Gems** for the first time (whichever is earlier).
- Event is live and not within `x` hours of ending. | | **Leaderboard (Ticket Mania)** | - Player has completed **5 games** from day of install. | | **FTUE for Challenge Request** | - User has completed **25 lifetime moves**.
- User has **not accepted any challenge requests earlier**.
- A challenge request is **available** for the user.
- User navigates to the **home screen**. | | **Match of the Day** | - Both player and their match have played at least **5 games** to see real players. | | **Facebook Connect Reward** | - Player connects to Facebook **once login has completed**. | | **Quest Center** | - Accessible **from the beginning** (not gated). | | **Daily Quest (Word Bingo)** | - Unlocked as per runtime `dqud` for new players.
- For older players, unlocked on **first visit to gameboard**. | | **No Ads Basic Package** (Payer/Non-Payer) | - Player receives this package for **7 days** from installation date (D0-D6 in Opts V2).
- First surfacing is after viewing the first interstitial ad.
- Pop-up will not resurface if the player has bought the pack.
- Only shown after **100 lifetime moves** (`starter_pack_moves` runtime). | | **No Ads Discounted Package** (Non-Payer) | - Player receives this package between **Day 7 and Day 30** (D2-D6 in Opts V2).
- Other conditions same as Basic Package. | | **No Ads Discounted + Coins** (Non-Payer) | - Player receives this package on and after **Day 30** (D7+ in Opts V2).
- Other conditions same as Basic Package. | | **No Ads Basic + Coins Package** (Payer) | - Player receives this package on and after **Day 7** (D7+ in Opts V2).
- Other conditions same as Basic Package. | | **Interstitial Ads** | - Unlocks after **20th move** (`ads_unlock` runtime).
- Will not unlock on the last round of the game (in no_ads experiment variant). | | **Starter Pack Pop-up** | - Player is eligible for the Starter Pack on that day.
- Max **6 lifetime views** (`starter_pack_max_cap` runtime).
- Only shown after **100 lifetime moves** (`starter_pack_moves` runtime).
- Pop-up priority below Master Pack. | | **Elite Pack Pop-up** | - Player has already converted as a **payer**.
- Max **100 surfacings** (`elite_pack_cap` runtime).
- Surfacing logic based on "Out of coins" scenario or daily surfacing. | | **Dictionary Feature** (FTUE for New Players) | - After the **15th move**.
- Will not trigger if player taps on a word before FTUE (meaning is shown, but FTUE is skipped). | | **Dictionary Feature** (FTUE for Existing Players) | - Player plays their **first word of the day**.
- Triggers **once** for the player. | | **Spinner (Lucky Spin)** | - Player is at least on **D3** (3rd day after install).
- Player has completed at least **26 lifetime moves**.
- Cannot be unlocked before game board W2E.
- `w2e` for Spinner must be initialized. | | **Timed Swap** (Spinner Reward) | - Player receives a **Timed Swap reward** from the Spinner for the first time.
- Available wherever paid swaps exist. | | **Food Fiesta Event** | - Event is **live**.
- Player is in the experiment variant. | | **Tile Drop System** (Food Fiesta / Seasons) | - System starts working after player has **collected their first tile**. | ### 🔍 **EVIDENCE** * **Bonus Tiles Powerup (Bot Games)**: "[Source: Bonus Tiles .pptx, Overview, Surfacing]" * **Bonus Tiles Powerup (Real Player Games)**: "[Source: Bonus Tiles .pptx, Overview]" * **Seasons Event**: "[Source: Seasons.pdf, Event details]" * **Solo Series (General Access)**: "[Source: Seasons.pdf, Gems]" (Also implied in Word Saga .pdf) * **Word of The Day (WOTD)**: "[Source: WoTD .pptx, Unlock condition]" * **Economy Changes Pop-up**: "[Source: Economy Changes.pptx, Economy Change Popup - Logic]" * **Daily Login Rewards (DLR)**: "[Source: DLR opts.pptx, Surfacing Logic]" * **RUX (Best Matches & Swap Frenzy)**: "[Source: RUX.pptx, Overview, Event Unlock]" * **Game Modes L2 Screen (DBH, Solo Series)**: "[Source: Home & Navigation Improvements.pdf, Home screen: Gamemodes L2]" * **Daily Quests (Home Screen section)**: "[Source: Home & Navigation Improvements.pdf, Home screen: Quests (Logic)]" (Also in Word Bingo (Wars 2.0) Spec.pdf, Daily Quest section) * **Word Saga Event**: "[Source: Word Saga.pdf, Event Details]" * **Leaderboard (Ticket Mania)**: "[Source: New LB Mechanic _ Ticket Mania.pptx, Feature Details]" * **FTUE for Challenge Request**: "[Source: Bot start notif fixes (1).pptx, Feature Details- FTUE for challenge request (1/2)]" * **Match of the Day**: "[Source: Word Bingo (Wars 2.0) Spec.pdf, Match of the day logic]" * **Facebook Connect Reward**: "[Source: Word Bingo (Wars 2.0) Spec.pdf, Facebook connect reward]" * **Quest Center**: "[Source: Word Bingo (Wars 2.0) Spec.pdf, Quest center]" * **Daily Quest (Word Bingo)**: "[Source: Word Bingo (Wars 2.0) Spec.pdf, Daily Quest: Unlock]" * **No Ads Basic Package (Non-Payer)**: "[Source: No Ads Pack.pptx, Types Of No Ads Packages, No Ads Basic Package - Surfacing for new players]" (Also in No Ads Opts.pptx for D0-D1). * **No Ads Discounted Package (Non-Payer)**: "[Source: No Ads Pack.pptx, Types Of No Ads Packages, No Ads Discounted Package - Surfacing]" (Also in No Ads Opts.pptx for D2-D6). * **No Ads Discounted + Coins (Non-Payer)**: "[Source: No Ads Pack.pptx, Types Of No Ads Packages, No Ads Discounted + Coins Package - Surfacing]" (Also in No Ads Opts.pptx for D7+). * **No Ads Basic + Coins Package (Payer)**: "[Source: No Ads Pack.pptx, Types Of No Ads Packages, No Ads Basic + Coins Package - Surfacing]" (Also in No Ads Opts.pptx for D7+). * **Interstitial Ads**: "[Source: Word Bingo (Wars 2.0) Spec.pdf, Ad monetisation - Overview, Interstitials]" (Also in No Ads Pack.pptx, Interstitial Ad Unlock Logic). * **Starter Pack Pop-up**: "[Source: IAP Roadmap.pptx, Starter pack pop up]" * **Elite Pack Pop-up**: "[Source: IAP Roadmap.pptx, Elite Pack pop up- Surfacing logic]" * **Dictionary Feature (FTUE for New Players)**: "[Source: Dictionary (Full Feature).pptx, Feature Flow: FTUE (New Players)]" * **Dictionary Feature (FTUE for Existing Players)**: "[Source: Dictionary (Full Feature).pptx, Feature Flow: FTUE (Existing Players)]" * **Spinner (Lucky Spin)**: "[Source: Spinner.pptx, UI & Mechanic, Spinner pop-up]" * **Timed Swap (Spinner Reward)**: "[Source: Spinner.pptx, Timed Swap]" * **Food Fiesta Event**: "[Source: Food fiesta.pdf, Event FTUE]" * **Tile Drop System (Food Fiesta / Seasons)**: "[Source: Food fiesta.pdf, Progress system]"

question: How many spins can I do in a day
answer:
### 📋 **CONTEXT**
The user is asking about the maximum number of spins a player can perform for the **Spinner (Lucky Spin)** feature within a day. This feature allows players to watch rewarded ads for various rewards.

### 🎯 **DIRECT ANSWER**
Players can do a maximum of **4 spins** within each 12-hour window. Since the spin cap resets twice a day (at 6 AM and 6 PM local time), a player can effectively perform up to **8 spins** in a 24-hour period if they utilize both reset windows.

### 🔍 **EVIDENCE**
"[Source: Spinner.pptx, UI & Mechanic, Spinner pop-up]" states:
*   "Player will be able to spin upto 4 times within set 12 hours (local time)"
*   "At 6am and 6pm, the spin cap will reset"
*   The `no_spins` runtime default value for both payers and non-payers is `4`.
